Pre-Game Insights: The Brewers are 53-19 in games when they record eight or more hits.
The Giants have the 10th-ranked team slugging percentage in the NL at.397.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The matchup Wednesday is the second time these teams meet this season.
William Contreras has a.281 batting average to lead the Brewers, and has 34 doubles, two triples and 17 home runs.
Matt Chapman leads the Giants with 21 home runs while slugging.443.
Others: Bill McCartney, a three-time coach of the year in the Big Eight Conference who led Colorado to its only football national championship in 1990, has died.
